fitting.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a piece of equipment in a house, for example a cooker or a fridge, that can be moved or taken with you when you sell the house
fitting.translation[0].definitions[1].de: an outside part of a piece of equipment that makes it possible to use or handle it
fitting.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a sink with chrome fittings  (=handle and taps)
fitting.translation[0].definitions[2].de: an occasion when you put on a piece of clothing that is being made for you, to see if it fits properly
fitting.translation[1].definitions[0].de: right for a particular situation or occasion
fitting.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: I thought the memorial was a fitting tribute to the president.
a fitting end to what was a memorable trip
It is only fitting that Simon should propose the first toast tonight.
